text: 280px ' (January 15, 1737 – August 29, 1754) was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled the Tokushima Domain. ==Family== * Father: Matsudaira Yorihiro (1700-1737) * Mother: Watabe-dono ==Reference== Category:1737 births Category:1754 deaths Category:Daimyo Category:Hachisuka clan
title: Hachisuka Yoshihiro
